headline: Vertex (VRTX) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Vertex (VRTX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
